FuncDef:
The entity command specifies a PKI entity that applies for a certificate.
The undo entity command cancels a PKI entity. The entity command specifies a PKI entity that applies for a certificate. The undo entity command cancels a PKI entity. By default, no PKI entity is specified.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a PKI entity.
The value must be an existing PKI entity name.

ExtraInfo: When a PKI entity requests the local certificate in the PKI realm, the device encapsulates the configuration of the specified PKI entity into the certificate request.
